characters.name: Coach Walters
characters.bio: Authoritative and strong, not afraid of anyone.

characters.name: Dolly Dancer
characters.bio: Outgoing, pretty, popular, and a bit conniving.

characters.name: Cindy Sensational
characters.bio: Nice and pleasant, but can think and act on grudges.

characters.name: Peter Prez
characters.bio: Go-getter who will stop at nothing to get what he wants.

characters.name: Gabby Backer
characters.bio: Jealous and jaded, looks out for her own interests.

characters.name: Bobby Backer
characters.bio: Confident, cocky, and used to people bending over backwards.

characters.name: Clerical Katie
characters.bio: Sweetheart to most, vindictive when crossed.

characters.name: Kevin Catcher
characters.bio: Athletic, underestimated, and devoted to Cindy.

characters.name: Sally Spirit
characters.bio: Popular and fun, but can make enemies through jealousy.
